section.title: Dependencies
section.para:
This Section lists some things that are kind of ugly in the sense that they may not work perfectly if some parameters are changed.
1) Map files: they must be in the map subdirectory and in the main directory. This is some deficiency of the TRAFFIC Library and will probably be fixed someday.

2) in SHARED_CONSTANTS:
Plane_size is magic number that is chosen with our example maps in mind. This works for them but it might not work perfectly for other map files. So this might have to be changed or made independent of the map file by either calculating it somehow or saving it in some configuration file.
map_to_gl_coords is also optimized for our example maps. They use the range of the coordinates from the map.

section.title: Reuseability
section.para: To start your documentation I recommend to copy and rename the sample-folder from the directory $EM/doc/sample. Please create your folder directly in this directory $EM/doc/! (replace the words "sample" through your foldername in all *.xml-files). It is important to have an index.xml as an overview about the whole documentation.
To add or remove documentation-files, you have also to change the build.geant. At the end of this file, you'll find a list with all activated files ("index" has to be the last item).
